 " <O> The office said 356,725 new cars were registered in July 1996 -- 304,850 passenger cars and 15,613 trucks  </O> " |

 " <O> Opel  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> together with  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> came in second place with 49,269 registrations , 16.4 percent of the overall figure  </O> " |

 " <O> -DOCSTART- Kindercare says debt buy to hit Q1 results  </O> " | 

 " <O> MONTGOMERY ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " | 

 " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> said on Thursday that a debt buyback would mean an extraordinary loss of $ 1.2 million in its fiscal 1997 first quarter  </O> " | 

 " <O> The company said that during the quarter , which began June 1 , it bought $ 30 million par value of its outstanding 10-3/8 percent senior notes due 2001  </O> " |

 " <O> LONDON 1996-08-23 Women who get measles while pregnant may have babies at higher risk of  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> 's disease , a debilitating bowel disorder , researchers said on Friday  </O> " | 

 " <O> Three out of four  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> babies born to mothers who caught measles developed serious cases of  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> 's disease , the researchers said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Dr  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> of the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> and colleagues screened 25,000 babies delivered at  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , between 1940 and 1949  </O> " | 

 " <O> Four of the mothers had measles while pregnant  </O> " | 

 " <O> Three of the four children had  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> 's disease ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> 's group wrote in the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> medical journal  </O> " | 

 " <O> Crohn 's is an inflammation of the bowel that can sometimes require surgery  </O> " | 

 " <O> It causes diarrhoea , abdominal pain and weight loss  </O> " | 

 " <O> The researchers said the three children involved had especially severe cases  </O> " | 

 " <O> Exposure to viruses can often cause birth defects  </O> " | 

 " <O> Most notably , women who get rubella (  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> measles ) have a high risk of a stillborn baby  </O> " |

 " <O> -DOCSTART- Garlic pills do n't lower cholesterol , study finds  </O> " | 

 " <O> LONDON 1996-08-22 Garlic pills may not lower blood cholesterol and studies that show they do may be flawed ,  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> researchers have reported  </O> " | 

 " <O> A study by a team of doctors at  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> has found people with high blood cholesterol do not benefit significantly from taking garlic tablets  </O> " | 

 " <O> The study involved 115 people with high blood cholesterol levels  </O> " | 

 " <O> They were given 900 milligrams a day of dried garlic powder or placebo tablets  </O> " | 

 " <O> There were no significant differences between the groups receiving garlic and placebo , they wrote in the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " | 

 " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> taking part were told to eat a low-fat diet for six weeks before they started taking the pills , and their blood cholesterol measured before and after the six-week period  </O> " | 

 " <O> The researchers said this would make their findings more accurate  </O> " | 

 " <O> Several studies have found garlic pills can lower blood pressure and blood cholesterol  </O> " | 

 " <O> But the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> team disputed these findings and said either previous trials may have been interpreted incorrectly , those taking part were not given special diets beforehand or the duration of the studies may have been too short  </O> " | 

 " <O> The six-month trial was funded by the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> and  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> , which makes  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> brand garlic tablets  </O> " | 

 " <O> The study did not address whether whole garlic could affect cholesterol  </O> " |

 " <O> This assistance will provide a fast track development programme for the designated ( northern ) safe area ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> said in a statement  </O> " |

 " <O> Rostislav  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 1996-08-23  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> celebrates five years of independence from  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> rule on Saturday , hailing civil and inter-ethnic peace as its main  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> achievement  </O> " | 

 " <O> Ukraine 's declaration of independence in 1991 , backed nine-to-one by a referendum in December of that year , effectively dealt a death blow to the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> empire and ended more than three centuries of rule from  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " | 

 " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , with a  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> community of 11 million people -- the world 's largest outside  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> -- has avoided conflicts like those in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , neighbouring  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , and the former  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> republics of  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> and  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " | 

 " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's biggest achievements for five years are the preservation of civil peace and inter-ethnic harmony , President  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said in televised statement this week  </O> " | 

 " <O> Unlike many other  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> countries we were able to deal with conflict situations in a peaceful and civilised way  </O> " | 

 " <O> But independence was initially accompanied by hyper-inflation and economic collapse , although there are signs of a turnaround  </O> " | 

 " <O> Inflation -- a hyper-inflationary 10,300 percent a year in 1993 -- was a respectable 0.1 percent a month in June and July and the economy has just begun to grow  </O> " | 

 " <O> Kuchma told a solemn ceremony at the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> on Friday that there was a turning point in reforms and that he expected a rise in the standard of living in the near future  </O> " |

 " <O> MOSCOW 1996-08-23  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> officials , keen to cut capital flight , will adopt tight measures to cut barter deals in foreign trade to a minimum , a customs official said on Friday  </O> " | 

 " <O> We have always been concerned about barter deals with other countries , viewing them as a disguised kind of capital flight from  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , deputy head of the currency department at the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> , told  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " | 

 " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> said last year goods had been exported under many  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> barter deals , with nothing imported in return  </O> " | 

 " <O> She said the cost of such unimported goods was $ 1.10 billion in 1995  </O> " | 

 " <O> Barter deals were worth $ 4.9 billion last year , or about eight percent of all  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> exports estimated at $ 61.5 billion , she said  </O> " | 

 " <O> The cost of exported goods is too often understated , so the actual share of barter deals in  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> exports and the amount of unimported goods may be even higher ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> A few days ago  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> President  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> issued a decree on state regulation of foreign barter deals , and  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said this could substantially improve the situation  </O> " | 

 " <O> In line with the decree , which will come into force on November 1 , all  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> barter traders will be obliged to import goods worth the cost of their exports within 180 days  </O> " | 

 " <O> If traders are late , they will have to pay fines worth the cost of their exported goods ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Understating the cost of exported goods could still be a loophole for barter dealers , but  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said the authorities are currently tackling the technicalities of the issue  </O> " | 

 " <O> Barter has always been a feature of the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's foreign trade , but  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> 's decrees liberalising foreign trade in 1991-1992 has given barter a new impetus  </O> " | 

 " <O> A few years ago , barter deals accounted for up to 25-30 percent of  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> exports because thousands ( of ) trade companies which popped up preferred barter in the absence of reliable  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> banks and money transfer systems ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Now many  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> banks are strong and can make various sorts of money tranfers , while incompetent traders are being ousted by more experienced ones  </O> " | 

 " <O> But the current share of barter deals in  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> exports is still high , she said  </O> " |

 " <O> Under the agreement , which followed talks in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> this week ,  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> also will be allowed to shift up to four of the weekly flights it now operates between  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> and  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> to its  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> gateway  </O> " |

 " <O> Volatility has come off a lot  </O> " | 

 " <O> We 're looking for it to stabilise now , said one  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> options trader at a  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> bank  </O> " | 

 " <O> A trader at a  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> bank said  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> volatility now stood at 14.00 for September contract , 16.75 for December , 19.50 for March and 21.25 for June  </O> " | 

 " <O> This compared with midweek levels , before the welter of interest rate cuts , of 18.50 for September , 20.00 for December , 22.00 for March and 23.5 for June , he said  </O> " | 

 " <O> At 1347  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> , December  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> futures were trading at 96.78 , two basis points down on the day  </O> " | 

 " <O> He said the sell-off in June vols might have been overdone , which could offer value at current levels  </O> " | 

 " <O> He said caps and floors would be well bid after the round of interest rate cuts due to the fact these rates should stay low at the short end  </O> " | 

 " <O> The size of the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> 's repo rate cut , to 3.00 percent from 3.30 percent , took markets by surprise  </O> " | 

 " <O> Volatility has a bid to it -- longer-dated volatility more than short-dated because the event people were buying for has passed and now perhaps people will sell some short dated vol and buy some long dated vol , he said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Long dated volatility has been low this year , so it is still at levels which are not historically high  </O> " | 

 " <O> It is not a dangerous level to own vol. You are not going to lose a lot and you could make quite a bit  </O> " | 

 " <O> He said volatility levels should be stable until markets reassess the situation after a long weekend in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " |

 " <O> At a hotel convention here , the party associated with the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> (  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> ) movement named physicist  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> as its presidential nominee for the Nov. 5 election  </O> " | 

 " <O> The party is running on a platform claiming it can ward off problems before they occur through techniques such as mass meditation that would reduce stress , crime , terrorism and even wars  </O> " | 

 " <O> Social stress can be reduced and problems such as crime and violence will automatically decrease , said a party paper  </O> " | 

 " <O> Many party members are practitioners of  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> , which involves meditating to a repeated word or phrase , called a mantra  </O> " | 

 " <O> Some advanced  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> followers contend they can actually mediate to such a point that they fly  </O> " | 

 " <O> But in a demonstration of yogic flying several years ago , critics said the people were merely bouncing off the ground from a sitting position  </O> " |

 " <O> Martin  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 1996-08-22 A year after its massively publicized introduction ,  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> 's  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> computer operating system has fallen short of the most optimistic expectations for the software giant and the industry  </O> " | 

 " <O> Even though more than 40 million copies of  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> have been sold , making it the fastest-selling new software ever , it would have been impossible for any product to live up to the unprecedented hype of the Aug. 24 , 1995 launch , when stores around the world opened at midnight to greet long lines of customers  </O> " | 

 " <O> The  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> company spent tens of millions of dollars promoting the product with stunts that included buying the entire print run of the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> and lighting  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> building in a  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> color scheme  </O> " |

 " <O> CHICAGO 1996-08-22 In keeping with its pioneering image in the area of welfare ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> was the first state to submit an administrative plan under the nation 's new welfare law , Gov  </O> " | 

 " <O> Tommy  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said Thursday  </O> " | 

 " <O> According to a new release from the governor ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> submitted a plan to the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> for administration of the new block grant system for welfare just minutes after President  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> signed the measure into law Thursday  </O> " | 

 " <O> As the nation 's leader in welfare reform ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> is far ahead of the curve and ready to go under this new system ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Still , the governor said the new law does not go as far as the state 's own welfare reform program , dubbed  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " | 

 " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> said that despite the new law ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> will still require federal waivers allowing the working poor to acquire health care coverage from the state , a 60-day residency requirement for participation in the welfare program , and child support collections to go directly to custodial parents  </O> " | 

 " <O> The nation 's new welfare reform law limits eligibility , gives states more power and ends direct federal aid for poor children  </O> " |

 " <O> Lynne  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 1996-08-23 Up to 100,000 tonnes of copper held in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> bonded warehouses , confounding the world market as to its source and ultimate fate , probably belongs to  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's strategic state reserve , industry sources said on Friday  </O> " | 

 " <O> Around 40,000 tonnes of the copper have already been moved to warehouses near the northern port of  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , where some of the strategic stockpile was stored , they said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Just who owns the copper is a question that has kept traders and industry analysts guessing since the metal was channelled into  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> by the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> (  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> ) in June and July  </O> " |

 " <O> Traders have said the reserve could negotiate concessions on duties -- three percent import tax and 17 percent value-added tax -- that made the copper prohibitively expensive otherwise  </O> " | 

 " <O> But one source , the head of a  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> trading house , said it made no difference if the copper was customs cleared or not  </O> " | 

 " <O> If they spend all this money moving the copper to  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , it will be sitting there for years , he said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Once it arrives in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , it is subject to monitoring by the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> , which has to give permission for any more movement ; it is out of the hands of traders , he said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Mystery has surrounded the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> stockpile in recent months , with traders unsure not only of who owns it , but of its exact size and what its owner planned to do with it  </O> " | 

 " <O> Trading sources generally agreed it would be cost-effective to take the copper back into a depleted central reserve as it had already served its purpose in taking advantage of long-term backwardation on the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> (  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> )  </O> " | 

 " <O> A backwardation occurs when the spot price of a metal is higher than the forward price  </O> " | 

 " <O> CNIEC lent around 85,000 tonnes of copper onto the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> between April and June 1995 on behalf of the state reserve , running the state stockpile down to 115,000 tonnes from 200,000 tonnes previously  </O> " | 

 " <O> Traders in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> said  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> could well have lent it to the market at around  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> 2,700 a tonne , and then paid somewhere between $ 2,200 and $ 2,400 a tonne when it started taking the metal back earlier this year  </O> " | 

 " <O> This would have cleared  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> a healthy profit , which could then have been used to finance storage and other costs  </O> " | 

 " <O> Word that  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> had offered the copper to  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> trading houses in a series of secret meetings unnerved an already jittery market  </O> " |

 " <O> SHANGHAI 1996-08-24 A  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> truck maker in which  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> has a 20 percent stake said it posted a 77 percent drop in post-tax profits in the first half of 1996  </O> " | 

 " <O> Jiangling  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> , in a statement in Saturday 's edition of the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> newspaper , said net profit in the period was 3.385 million yuan , down from 14.956 million in the same 1995 period  </O> " | 

 " <O> Turnover fell to 937.891 million yuan from 1.215 billion , while net assets per share were 1.88 yuan , unchanged , and earnings per share fell to 0.005 yuan from 0.02 yuan , the statement said  </O> " | 

 " <O> In the first half , the company said it produced 8,333 vehicles and sold 9,018 , but it did not explain the difference  </O> " | 

 " <O> It blamed the drop in profits on a weak vehicle market and said as its engine plant had only just started trial production , the company 's results would not improve in the short-term  </O> " |

 " <O> -DOCSTART- Adventurers start  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> wilderness race  </O> " | 

 " <O> PEMBERTON ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 1996-08-24 About 350 adventurers from nine countries set out on Saturday to climb , raft , bike and run in a 323-mile ( 517-km ) endurance race through the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> wilderness  </O> " | 

 " <O> The event , called the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> , is part of a growing sport known as adventure racing in which competitors test their limits for days over a perilous wilderness course  </O> " | 

 " <O> I 'm looking forward to this race  </O> " | 

 " <O> I think it will be more physically challenging and we 'll have to go up against more diverse situations due to the terrain , said Dr.  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , a veteran  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> participant  </O> " | 

 " <O> The  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> has been staged twice before -- in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> and  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> last year -- and is modelled on similar races overseas  </O> " | 

 " <O> The 70 teams in this year 's race will will trek glaciers , climb mountains , whitewater raft , horseback ride , canoe and mountain bike along the grueling course  </O> " | 

 " <O> This year 's race , the route of which was keep a secret until Friday evening , is being held near  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , about 100 miles ( 160 km ) northeast of  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " | 

 " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> area is filled with treacherous mountain peaks , ice fields and frigid waters  </O> " | 

 " <O> Organisers expect about two-thirds of the participants to drop out or be disqualified before the finish  </O> " | 

 " <O> The hardy ones are expected to complete the course in about six days , with first-place finishers receiving $ 10,000 in prize money  </O> " | 

 " <O> In the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> , competitors race in teams of five which must include both men and women  </O> " | 

 " <O> Team members must remain within 100 yards ( metres ) of each other at all times and finish together  </O> " | 

 " <O> With racers carrying about 40 pounds ( 18 kg ) of gear on their backs , broken bones , sunstroke , dehydration and exhaustion are common  </O> " |

 " <O> Union officials from the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> (  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> ) were unavailable for comment  </O> " |

 " <O> The government had been threatening to fire the workers since the strike began on Tuesday , saying it was illegal  </O> " | 

 " <O> But the strikers ignored the threat and vowed to stay on the streets until their demands for wage rises of 30 to 60 percent were met  </O> " | 

 " <O> The stoppage has left essential services stretched with many hospitals handling only emergency cases under senior doctors with the help of army medical personnel and the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " |

 " <O> Zinzan  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , the only No 8 in test rugby to have scored a dropped goal when he kicked a three-pointer against  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> during last year 's  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> , added a second to his name yesterday  </O> " |

 " <O> It cost me a few bucks at the bar  </O> " |

 " <O> ' ' Centre  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said he had never felt so exhausted during a match  </O> " |

 " <O> Anton  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 1996-08-25  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's truth commission begins issuing subpoenas this week in a bid to dig beneath the political rationales and find the sinister figures who have the blood of the country 's race war on their hands  </O> " | 

 " <O> Leaders of the major parties involved , from right-wing whites to radical blacks , appeared before Archbishop  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> 's  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> last week to paint the broad picture of their actions for or against apartheid  </O> " | 

 " <O> Most , including former president  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> and  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> Deputy President  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , offered apologies for any mistakes they had made and accepted broad responsibility for the actions of their foot soldiers  </O> " | 

 " <O> But none named those guilty of ordering or carrying out any of the gross violations of human rights which  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> is investigating  </O> " | 

 " <O> Human rights lawyer  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said the hearings last week were not intended as a form of confessional and that those who personally committed crimes during apartheid would testify only before a separate arm of the commission , the amnesty committee  </O> " | 

 " <O> I do n't think one should have expected more than what one got , he said  </O> " | 

 " <O> That was not the amnesty committee where perpetrators are expected to open their hearts and souls and to tell it all  </O> " | 

 " <O> The commission , which has the power to grant amnesty to those who confess to abuses , has begun hearing the testimony from people already in jail for their deeds  </O> " | 

 " <O> But others , such as self-confessed secret police hit-squad leader  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , have yet to testify  </O> " | 

 " <O> Tutu 's deputy chairman ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , told reporters the commission would begin issuing subpoenas to suspects who refused to appear voluntarily some time this week  </O> " | 

 " <O> He added that former hardline apartheid president  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> could be among those called  </O> " | 

 " <O> But  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , who is advising several people regarded as perpetrators , said this was not the best way to achieve the commission 's aims  </O> " | 

 " <O> A person can be forced to appear , but the only way one is going to get to the truth in its totality is if people feel it is a good idea to go to the amnesty committee  </O> " | 

 " <O> At the moment this is not the case  </O> " | 

 " <O> He cited  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , who was charged with murder after confessing in media interviews to dirty tricks  </O> " | 

 " <O> His trial is due to start in December but the truth commission intends to decide on his amnesty application before that  </O> " | 

 " <O> Currin said the law had to be changed so all judicial prosecutions were automatically suspended for those who approached the truth commission  </O> " | 

 " <O> Last week 's submissions to the commission by the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> 's  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> and the right-wing  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> of General  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> left many  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> unsatisfied  </O> " | 

 " <O> Boraine said the picture was incomplete because officers of the apartheid-era security forces had yet to make their scheduled , separate submission , but one black caller to a radio talk show declared : This whole thing is utterly useless , it does n't help us at all  </O> " | 

 " <O> What the people expect is to have houses , to have jobs  </O> " | 

 " <O> Political scientist  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said he doubted that the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> , which implemented apartheid in 1948 and began dismantling it in 1990 , felt it carried a burden of guilt and needed to be exculpated through the commission  </O> " | 

 " <O> Therefore I have some doubts about achieving some form of reconciliation  </O> " | 

 " <O> One has to feel a bit guilty to feel the need for reconciling yourself to a historical adversary , he said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Professor  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> of the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> demurred , saying : In the irritation , in the jokes , in the anger that white  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> express about the commission , I think there 's a moral uneasiness , and I think that 's healthy  </O> " | 

 " <O> Responsibility is percolating downwards  </O> " |

 " <O> Samir  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 1996-08-25 Thousands of  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> refugees denounced  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's elections as a farce on Sunday because  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> incomers would be able to vote in their old home town , cementing partition of the country  </O> " |

 " <O> As a result , separatist  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> authorities have packed former  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> majority towns with refugees of their own or registered other  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> to vote there  </O> " |

 " <O> Only our physical presence in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> will mean that the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> peace treaty has truly been implemented ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> imam-in-exile , told the refugees  </O> " |

 " <O> Eleven thousand  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> who came from elsewhere to  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> will vote there  </O> " | 

 " <O> How can we then expect the reintegration of  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> ?  </O> " | 

 " <O> But no one will stop us from returning to our homes  </O> " | 

 " <O> Mirhunisa  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , a government refugee official , said : We want to vote where we were thrown out from  </O> " | 

 " <O> This is a protest of warning and the next step is entering our town using all means possible , so let them shoot  </O> " | 

 " <O> Bosnian Vice President  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , a  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> , told the refugees : We have a message for the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> who are now in our homes not to plan the future of their children there because there will be no good fortune in that  </O> " |

 " <O> -DOCSTART- Corporate  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> taking new view on compensation  </O> " | 

 " <O> Anne  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 1996-08-23 Corporate  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> is planning major changes in employee compensation in the next few years , according to a recent study  </O> " | 

 " <O> What it comes down to is this : If you 're highly skilled , you 'll benefit nicely  </O> " | 

 " <O> But if you 're not and cannot contribute to your employer 's goals , you 'll be paid less  </O> " | 

 " <O> The survey , conducted in late 1995 and the early part of this year by management consulting firm  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> , showed that the focus will be on an employee 's overall value to the company 's bottom line -- rather than how well an employee performs a specific task  </O> " | 

 " <O> Presently , for example , if an accountant 's job involves doing five specific tasks , he or she can expect a certain salary , said  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , a  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> principal  </O> " | 

 " <O> In the future , the accountant will be evaluated solely on knowledge , skill and abilities , she said  </O> " | 

 " <O> In addition to using accounting skills , the accountant will also have to be creative , work well in a team , be sensitive to customer needs and set productivity goals  </O> " | 

 " <O> The good news is , if you 're highly skilled and have many abilities , you 'll be paid more , said  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " | 

 " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> bad news is , if you 're not skilled and ca n't contribute to a team , to customer service and the organisation 's goals , you 'll be paid less  </O> " | 

 " <O> Of the 750 mid-to-large size corporations surveyed , 81 percent had undergone a major restructuring in the last three years , and more than two-thirds reported that productivity and profits were up as result  </O> " | 

 " <O> Next on the agenda for these firms is developing a new compensation structure , and 78 percent report that they are considering a new , skills-based plan for both management and non-management employees  </O> " | 

 " <O> This coming shift ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said , is not just isolated or a fad  </O> " | 

 " <O> It 's an inexorable change  </O> " | 

 " <O> After  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> , corporations adopted a military model creating hierarchical organisations where the concept of defined tasks worked great , she said  </O> " | 

 " <O> But as the economy became global , customers were more demanding and problems became more complex  </O> " | 

 " <O> Multi-layers kept management at a distance from its customers ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Now organisations must change to stay competitive  </O> " | 

 " <O> O'Neal says firms will place a greater emphasis on teams and team performance in giving raises  </O> " | 

 " <O> If your team does well , you 'll do well  </O> " | 

 " <O> If it does n't do well , do n't expect a raise  </O> " | 

 " <O> Is this fair to an employee who can go the distance but is on a team that ca n't keep up ?  </O> " | 

 " <O> That 's an important question we used to ask a lot , said  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " | 

 " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> 's not a question we ask any more  </O> " | 

 " <O> The more important question is -- ' Do we have results ?  </O> " | 

 " <O> ' To get those results , 27 percent of the companies surveyed plan to eliminate base pay increases in favour of cash bonuses and incentives , such as employee and team award programmes and education  </O> " | 

 " <O> Companies that can change their culture and view employees as business partners will do well ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> For example , the survey rated some participants in the survey as high-performing companies , based on their return on equity above 16 percent  </O> " | 

 " <O> Those companies also said they already offer employees variable pay and business education , give their managers more control over pay decisions and celebrate employee and team success  </O> " | 

 " <O> They respect employees more , they trust employees more and they value their employees more ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> The key to success at high-performance companies is engaging employees in a business partnership  </O> " | 

 " <O> It will improve a company 's bottom line  </O> " |

 " <O> -DOCSTART- FEATURE - Fertile  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> faces drought of cash and rain  </O> " | 

 " <O> Irene  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 1996-08-26 Four shiny new green-and-yellow  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> combines parked at this 1,750-hectare ( 4,325-acre ) farm in the grain-growing regions south of  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> do n't fill its chief agronomist with enthusiasm  </O> " | 

 " <O> They did a good job this year , but they need good diesel and good engine oil , said  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " | 

 " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> help us if there is a breakdown , he said of the machinery , loaned to the farm after the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> government bought it earlier this year  </O> " | 

 " <O> The country 's grain harvest this year is forecast to fall by more than 23 percent to only 28 million tonnes and two harsh factors are to blame  </O> " | 

 " <O> A drought scoured the steppes in May and June , stunting the growing wheat  </O> " | 

 " <O> And the farming sector , making the painful transition from  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> central planning to a market economy simply has no money  </O> " | 

 " <O> Ukraine 's black soil is so fertile that a diplomat described it as rich enough to grow rubber boots  </O> " | 

 " <O> But recently  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> has been losing its reputation as a breadbasket of  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , earned in the years before brutal forced collectivisation under  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> dictator  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " | 

 " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> wheat will not be of a good quality this year , said  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , a scientist at the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> , run by the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " | 

 " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> temperature on the ground reached 62 decrees  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> ( 143.60 Fahrenheit ) this summer  </O> " | 

 " <O> We 've never seen anything so bad , he said in an interview in his office , unlit since the government cut off electricity because of unpaid power bills  </O> " | 

 " <O> The harvest is gathered in the dry areas , but rainfall in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> has delayed harvesting there  </O> " | 

 " <O> While  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> 's scientists , some unpaid for months , carry on developing new strains of wheat resistant to  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's extreme continental climate ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said the lack of cash in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's agricultural sector is as bad as the drought  </O> " | 

 " <O> Collective farms and  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's nascent private farming sector have no money for fertiliser , no money for herbicides and pesticides , no money to repair old or buy new machinery , no money for fuel , and none to buy good seed  </O> " | 

 " <O> This year 's harvest is down from last year 's 36.5 million tonne harvest , which in turn compares with 50 million tonnes in 1990 , the year before independence  </O> " | 

 " <O> The decline is all the worse for people who recall wasteful  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> times , when the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> imported grain but priced bread so cheaply that people bought it to feed their pigs  </O> " | 

 " <O> Agriculture is very expensive , and there are no solutions to our problems on the horizon , said  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " | 

 " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said his farm , its 260 workers now readying the fields for winter wheat sowing , expected the land to yield 5.2 tonnes per hectare ( 2.5 acres ) but ended up with 3.9 tonnes -- still better than the national average of 2.11 tonnes per hectare this year  </O> " | 

 " <O> We did not have money for fertiliser , we 're in debt for fuel , and we 're borrowing diesel ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> A few kilometres ( miles ) down the two-lane road which passes  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> 's farm , where the occasional horse-drawn buggy passes by , is the 1,700-hectare ( 4,200-acre )  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> collective farm , built next to a village still neat and tidy despite  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> decay  </O> " | 

 " <O> Chief Accountant  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said the collective is strapped for cash , earlier this year bartering 220 tonnes of grain for diesel to fuel six rickety grain combines and tractors badly in need of repairs and basic maintenance  </O> " | 

 " <O> The average family earns 160-200 million karbovanets a year ( $ 800 - $ 1,000 ) -- but many have not been paid in months ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> People are working out of their own dedication  </O> " | 

 " <O> Borsuk said the farm sector has two options : We can sit down and cry , or we can do something  </O> " | 

 " <O> He said the government plans to increase the sowing of the winter wheat which will be harvested next year  </O> " | 

 " <O> Planted in late summer and early autumn , the grain is  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's largest export item and traditionally grows better than summer wheat in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's soil  </O> " | 

 " <O> Further plans , he said , called for full provision of resources like fertiliser and herbicides for 25 percent of  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's arable land next year , for 50 percent in 1998 and 100 percent of the land in 1999  </O> " | 

 " <O> If we follow this we 'll be able to sell 10 million tonnes of grain by the year 2000 ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> The government has been trying to phase out huge subsidies to the farm sector , and in a move back to  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> days has given up to 50 hectares ( 124 acres ) of land to some 36,000 private farmers willing to go it alone  </O> " | 

 " <O> Collective farms will last for the next few years , because most private farms now only produce enough to feed themselves with maybe a little extra to sell , said one private farmer : In the future , maybe , but it 's better not to hurry  </O> " | 

 " <O> Collectivisation brought us a lot of pain  </O> " | 

 " <O> And it went too fast  </O> " | 

 " <O> Privatising too quickly can also have a negative outcome  </O> " | 

 " <O> -DOCSTART-  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> swells profit despite setbacks  </O> " | 

 " <O> Melanie  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 1996-08-26  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> on Monday said it had swelled its year attributable profit and streamlined operations to strengthen it for the current financial year despite a variety of divisional setbacks  </O> " |

 " <O> In 1968 ,  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> introduced the world 's first infusion therapy monitoring device  </O> " | 

 " <O> A year later  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> improved its system with the addition of an IV pump that regulated the flow of liquids through positive pressure  </O> " | 

 " <O> IMED introduced the world 's first volumetric infusion pump in 1974  </O> " | 

 " <O> IMED had profits of $ 1.7 million , or 6 cents per fully diluted common share , on $ 53.9 million in revenues in the first half of 1996  </O> " |

 " <O> -DOCSTART-  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> files reorganization plan  </O> " | 

 " <O> [ CORRECTED 18:00  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> ]  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " | 

 " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> , an operator of 42 family apparel stores in six northwestern states , said it has filed a reorganization plan in bankruptcy court in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " | 

 " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> Corrects to make clear a reorganization plan has been filed )  </O> " | 

 " <O> The reorganization plan calls for all secured claims to be paid in full  </O> " | 

 " <O> Unsecured claims , including those of company bondholders , will be satisfied by issuing new common stock and warrants  </O> " | 

 " <O> Unsecured claims are estimated at about $ 90 million  </O> " | 

 " <O> Lamonts said it plans to issue 9 million shares of new common stock  </O> " | 

 " <O> Of that amount , 4.05 million and 5.67 million shares will be allocated to the company 's trade creditors  </O> " | 

 " <O> Between 4.75 and 3.13 million shares will be allocated to bondholders and other unsecured non-trade creditors and 200,000 will be allocated to existing shareholders in exchange for all existing stock of the company  </O> " | 

 " <O> Bondholders and other unsecured non-trade creditors will receive warrants four about 2.2 million shares when the company 's market capitalization reaches $ 20 million  </O> " | 

 " <O> Bondholders , other unsecured non-trade creditors , and existing shareholders also will receive warrants entitling them to roughly 800,000 shares when the company 's market capitalization reaches $ 25 million  </O> " | 

 " <O> Management will receive options to purchase 10 percent of the company 's outstanding common stock with protection against dilution at an option exercise price of $ 1 million  </O> " |

 " <O> ZAGREB 1996-08-26 The  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> lending rate fell to 8.0 percent on Monday from last Friday 's 9.1 percent after thin demand for kuna forced bank lenders to trim their rates further  </O> " | 

 " <O> Interbank call money was down to 8.0 from 10.0 percent  </O> " | 

 " <O> Insurers ' five-10 and 10-15 day loans were made at a steady 8.0 percent after last week 's drop from an earlier 15 percent  </O> " | 

 " <O> Total  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> settlements shrank to 17.4 million kuna , of which dealers put new borrowing at a meagre 5.5 million  </O> " | 

 " <O> Supply stood at a high 180 million kuna  </O> " | 

 " <O> Overnight trade at the weekend left a surplus of 1.2 billion kuna on the supply side after 40 million were settled  </O> " |

 " <O> SOFIA 1996-08-26  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> air traffic controllers will go on strike on September 3 demanding higher pay , the chief of the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> association of air traffic controllers (  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> ) said on Monday  </O> " | 

 " <O> Stefan  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> told a news conference the strike by more than half of the 1,380 traffic controllers and technicians would paralyse traffic which has increased by 10 percent since last year  </O> " | 

 " <O> More than 1,500 planes per day fly over  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , in a strategic location between  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> and the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> and the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> The director general of the air traffic service  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said last Friday that a controllers ' strike would be illegal  </O> " | 

 " <O> Valkov said he could not curb the summer charter flights of national carrier  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> , which carries thousands of foreign tourists to the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> resorts  </O> " | 

 " <O> But  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said it would be discrimination against the other airlines if only  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> planes were guided in  </O> " | 

 " <O> Under the law before launching the strike we have to sign an agreement with our employer for a minimal transport servicing of emergency flights ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Raichev said a lock-out with military air controllers was impossible as they did not speak  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " |

 " <O> They also demand the financial separation of the 350 air controllers from the technical staff  </O> " |

 " <O> MEXICO  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 1996-08-26  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> brokerage on Monday raised its forecasts for 1996 gross domestic product growth to 4.3 percent from 3.8 percent , but it kept its 1997 projection unchanged at 4.5 percent , a statement said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Economist  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said the revisions were chiefly fueled by stronger than expected growth of 7.2 percent in the second quarter and he forecast an annual GDP rise of 6.1 percent in the third quarter and 4.9 percent in Q4  </O> " | 

 " <O> The firm also revised down its year-end peso forecast to 7.85-8.15 per dollar from 8.20-8.50  </O> " | 

 " <O> It forecast an end 1997 peso in the range of 9.20-9.40  </O> " | 

 " <O> Interacciones kept its 1996 and 1997 inflation forecast unchanged at 26 percent and 20 percent , expecting the government 's 1997 inflation target to be around 15 percent  </O> " | 

 " <O> It bumped up its average interest rate projection in 1997 to 25.8 percent from 23 percent  </O> " | 

 " <O> Fiscal policy was expected to be loosened a bit in the second half of this year , boosting growth without running into a deficit  </O> " | 

 " <O> Next year , the fiscal policy will have less margin of freedom because the government will have to face commitments that it has taken on under different support schemes for the banks , debtors and firms , the brokerage said  </O> " |

 " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> they are also campaigning on broader issue such as stopping the government road building programme and out-of-town superstores which they say create more traffic , pollution and damage local communities  </O> " | 

 " <O> The government has slashed its road-building spending  </O> " | 

 " <O> Although protests may have contributed to the decision it has been seen primarily as economic rather than ecological  </O> " | 

 " <O> Graham  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , chief executive of the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> , said : I do n't think many firms involved in tendering for sensitive projects realise the impact environmental activity has on the cost of running a project  </O> " | 

 " <O> But they are more alert than they were 3-4 years ago  </O> " | 

 " <O> There 's no doubt it 's a big issue now  </O> " | 

 " <O> He says the damage comes in two forms : Tangible -- in the form of extra costs , additional security , threats to staff and the more intangible damage caused by negative publicity  </O> " | 

 " <O> Watts said the cost of protesting can be heavy once the company is locked into a contract  </O> " | 

 " <O> I do often hear on the industry circuit of tales where the company tenders at low margins and the demonstrations which follow means they are running the project at a loss  </O> " |

 " <O> Hundreds of thousands of pounds ( dollars ) of damage was done in one day  </O> " | 

 " <O> Plus there was the knock-on cost of lost production and extra security in future  </O> " | 

 " <O> Simon  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , analyst at investement bank  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> , said this new phenomenon has led to a change in the way the industry evaluates project risk  </O> " | 

 " <O> When talking to  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> about the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> link ( through  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> ) they made it fairly clear that their risk assessment methods have been changed and now involve a very clear environmental risk analysis  </O> " | 

 " <O> Harding says others have done the same  </O> " | 

 " <O> As a result of eco-terrorism we are looking at controversial jobs more closely to see if the profit margins are wide enough to cover things like extra security  </O> " | 

 " <O> For an industry already suffering from razor-thin margins , overcapacity and stagnant demand , eco-terrorism is the latest bizarre twist in the construction sector 's tale of woe  </O> " |

 " <O> Police said they made 30 arrests and there were two stabbings  </O> " | 

 " <O> But there was no repeat of the ugly scenes that used to scar the street festival , and police praised the crowds over the two days of festivities as good-natured  </O> " |

 " <O> Shopkeepers still board up their windows and many residents leave town for the weekend , but for four or five years there has been no disorder and relatively little crime  </O> " |

 " <O> CHICAGO 1996-08-27 Millfeed supplies for prompt shipment remained tight and prices continued to move higher , millfeed dealers said  </O> " | 

 " <O> High-priced corn and increased demand for livestock feed continued to support millfeed prices in nearly all sectors  </O> " | 

 " <O> Flour mills sold much of their production through September leaving little available for prompt shipment  </O> " | 

 " <O> Portland sources said feed mixer demand was keeping pace with millfeed production and driving prices higher  </O> " | 

 " <O> Portland sources said with corn priced there at $ 200 per ton and barley at $ 140 , the millfeeds at $ 125 represent a good value  </O> " | 

 " <O> In the southeast  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , dealers said feed mixers continued to be steady buyers with demand increasing for October to March positions  </O> " | 

 " <O> The closely-watched  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> rail market was steady at $ 115 per ton bid and $ 118 offered  </O> " |

 " <O> PHILADELPHIA 1996-08-27 A two-year old  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> girl began surgical treatment on Tuesday for a rare condition that has left half of her face covered with a hairy , dark-brown patch of skin  </O> " | 

 " <O> The girl ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , suffers from a hairy nevus on the right side of her face , a condition that has only been reported a few times in medical journals , the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> In addition to social ostracism , the condition also carries a high risk of cancer  </O> " | 

 " <O> It will be corrected by gradually expanding healthy skin with a surgical balloon , then transplanting that skin to the afflicted side of her face  </O> " | 

 " <O> She is doing well , hospital spokeswoman  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> The surgery is under way  </O> " |

 " <O> More saline solution will be inserted in 16 weekly treatments  </O> " | 

 " <O> The girl , who was accompanied to  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> by her parents , will need more surgery later to correct the condition on her chest , back and legs , the hospital said  </O> " |

 " <O> -DOCSTART-  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> home sales dip in July - report  </O> " | 

 " <O> BOSTON 1996-08-27 Home sales across  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> were down 2.3 percent in July , compared to a month earlier , but up 21 percent for the year , according to the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " | 

 " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> association said a total of 4,464 single-family homes were sold in July , compared to 4,570 in June  </O> " | 

 " <O> The average selling price , $ 206,464 , was up 10.6 percent over July 1995  </O> " | 

 " <O> Condominium sales edged up 6.0 percent for July and 24.8 percent for the year , the group said , while prices for condos nudged up less than 1.0 percent to an average of $ 123,394  </O> " | 

 " <O> In July , the average rate on a 30-year fixed rate mortgage was 8.25 percent , below June 's 8.32 percent but still higher than February 's 7.03 percent , the report noted  </O> " |

 " <O> KARACHI ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 1996-08-27 The  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> of  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> auctioned three- , five- and 10-year federal investment bonds worth 1.38 billion rupees on Tuesday  </O> " | 

 " <O> The bank said it had accepted bids of 250 million rupees at par for three-year bonds , 3.5 million rupees at par for five-year bonds and 1.126 billion at par for 10-year bonds  </O> " | 

 " <O> The auction is set for settlement on Thursday  </O> " |

 " <O> India blocked the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> (  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> ) at the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , saying the pact did not contain a clause committing the five declared nuclear powers to a timetable for nuclear disarmament  </O> " | 

 " <O> New  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's stance , which was seen as effectively thwarting 2-1/2 years of negotiations at the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> , drew widespread but generally muted foreign criticism  </O> " | 

 " <O> India has also pledged to oppose any forwarding of the draft treaty to the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " | 

 " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> said many countries had compromised to complete the treaty and that the issue of a disarmament schedule could be discussed in future negotiations  </O> " | 

 " <O> The completion of the test ban treaty would be an important and practical step in the gradual process of achieving total nuclear disarmament , it said  </O> " | 

 " <O> China has pledged support for the pact since reaching a deal with the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> that made international inspections of nuclear sites more difficult than in earlier drafts of the accord  </O> " | 

 " <O> The newspaper said  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> advocated the complete ban and destruction of nuclear weapons but that there was little hope other nuclear powers would soon adopt the same stance  </O> " | 

 " <O> Some nuclear powers stubbornly uphold policies of nuclear deterrence based on first use of nuclear weapons , it said  </O> " |

 " <O> The  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> colon bacillus has been found responsible for a widespread food poisoning epidemic that has killed 11 people and made over 9,500 ill this year  </O> " | 

 " <O> Sakai , near the regional commercial centre of  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , has been hit hardest by the deadly bacteria , with nearly 6,500 , mostly schoolchildren , affected by the disease  </O> " | 

 " <O> Two children in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> have died from complications associated with the bacteria  </O> " | 

 " <O> Kan told a cabinet meeting on Tuesday that no new victims have been reported since August 8 , indicating that the peak has passed , at least for  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " | 

 " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> officials agreed with the assessment , but said it was too early to feel relieved  </O> " | 

 " <O> There are still patients hospitalised and problems which must be dealt with , a city spokesman said , citing the issue of whether to allow children infected with the bacteria but not showing symptoms to attend school from September  </O> " | 

 " <O> Health authorities believe school lunches were the source of the food poisoning in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , but researchers have been unable to pinpoint the exact source of the infection  </O> " | 

 " <O> The outbreak has prompted authorities to tighten sanitary standards at slaughterhouses and meatpacking plants and sparked calls for an overhaul of the nation 's school lunch programme  </O> " | 

 " <O> The ministers agreed at Tuesday 's cabinet meeting to step up inspection measures for school lunches in September and October , when schools around the country resume  </O> " |

 " <O> -DOCSTART-  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> aluminium shipments surge 8.9 pct in July  </O> " | 

 " <O> TOKYO 1996-08-27  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> shipments of aluminium mill products in July surged 8.9 percent over the same month last year to 224,609 tonnes , while production rose 6.4 percent to 222,457 tonnes , according to preliminary data released on Tuesday by the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " | 

 " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> surge reflected strong demand from the beverage can and housing construction sectors , federation officials said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Figures released two weeks ago from  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's seven largest mills already showed that  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's can sheet output reached its highest monthly level ever in July , reflecting above-average temperatures that sparked a jump in beer consumption  </O> " | 

 " <O> A federation official added that the half-year through September 1996 also appeared likely to set a new record for can production , despite cooler temperatures in August  </O> " | 

 " <O> July inventories stood at 75,632 tonnes , down 2.6 percent from the prior month  </O> " | 

 " <O> July foil output was off 0.2 percent year-on-year at 11,525 tonnes , while foil shipments fell 0.8 percent to 11,244 tonnes  </O> " | 

 " <O> June mill output data were revised slightly downward to 210,622 tonnes from the preliminary 210,683 , while shipments were revised marginally upward to 213,989 tonnes from 213,845  </O> " | 

 " <O> Final figures for June pegged can stock shipments at 40,144 tonnes , up 2.4 percent year-on-year  </O> " | 

 " <O> Shipments to the auto sector fell 5.5 percent to 15,286 tonnes , while the construction sector rose 2.4 percent to 79,390 tonnes  </O> " | 

 " <O> Exports dipped 3.7 percent to 18,867 tonnes  </O> " |

 " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> adopts rules to improve investor access to best stock prices  </O> " | 

 " <O> WASHINGTON 1996-08-28 The  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> Wednesday approved rules designed to give stock market investors a better chance at getting the best price available for their orders  </O> " | 

 " <O> The so-called order handling rules , which were proposed last September , were approved in a 4-0 vote  </O> " | 

 " <O> The new rules will require specialists at stock exchanges and market makers on  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> to allow customers to view price quotes from other electronic trading systems that may not be readily available to them  </O> " | 

 " <O> The rules will also require that customer limit orders be displayed with prices better than those available in quotes publicly available at the time  </O> " | 

 " <O> Specialists and market makers are companies or individuals recognised as qualified to maintain an orderly market in a stock  </O> " | 

 " <O> In a limit order , investors specify the price at which they are willing to buy or sell , as opposed to a market order executed at prevailing prices  </O> " | 

 " <O> These rules are intended to empower all investors , by allowing their orders to compete on a level playing field , and by providing the disclosure they need to make informed decisions , said  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> Chairman  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " | 

 " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> 's goal , he added , was to create one system where one price could be available to everybody  </O> " | 

 " <O> The director of the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> 's division of market regulation ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , said  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> firms will probably need to spend about $ 7 million to carry out the improvements called for by the new rules  </O> " | 

 " <O> In proposing the rules last year , the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> noted that while technology has improved , commonplace practices still existed that worked against investors ' best interests  </O> " | 

 " <O> It noted that customers whose orders were not displayed lost the chance of getting the best possible price available in the market  </O> " | 

 " <O> It also cited the potential problem of a two-tiered market in which market makers quote one price to public investors while quoting better prices in private systems , thus robbing investors without access to hidden quotes the benefit of the best available prices  </O> " | 

 " <O> Earlier this month , the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> settled charges of alleged malpractices on  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> when the parent of the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> market , the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> , agreed to spend $ 100 million over five years to upgrade its oversight of brokers ' trading practices  </O> " | 

 " <O> The  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> dropped a third proposal that would have allowed investors with market orders to trade at a better price if there were shifts in prices before their orders were executed  </O> " | 

 " <O> The agency said it would monitor effects of the two new rules before considering the price improvement proposal again  </O> " | 

 " <O> The agency also proposed rule changes that would require continuous bid and ask quotations from exchange specialists and market makers who trade more than 1 percent of a stock during any quarter on  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " | 

 " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> 's limit order display rule will mean a major change for  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> , where such orders have never been displayed  </O> " | 

 " <O> The president of the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , was to hold a news conference Wednesday afternoon to elaborate on the new rules ' effects on the market , the second largest in the world  </O> " | 

 " <O> -DOCSTART-  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> CABINET APPROVES TELEVISION DECREE  </O> " | 

 " <O> ROME 1996-08-28 The  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> cabinet on Wednesday granted a reprieve for media mogul  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> 's  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> television empire with a decree extending the current legal framework for television stations until January 31 , 1997  </O> " | 

 " <O> The decree plugs a legal void in which magistrates could have forced the former prime minister to take one of the three stations he controls off the air because of a court ruling that no single proprietor should be allowed to keep three channels  </O> " | 

 " <O> -DOCSTART- Passengers injured in train collision in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " | 

 " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 1996-08-28 A passenger train collided with a locomotive at a main railway station in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> on Wednesday and police said around 10 people were injured  </O> " | 

 " <O> Austrian television reported earlier that more than 20 had been hurt in the accident at the station in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , 300 km ( 180 miles ) west of  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " | 

 " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> locomotive was stationary and the passenger train collided into the back of it , a police spokesman in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> told  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> by telephone  </O> " | 

 " <O> The express passenger train travelling from  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , southeast of  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , with around 80 people on board , hit the back of a service locomotive used to shunt wagons into sidings  </O> " | 

 " <O> The police spokesman said he was not sure whether any more passengers were still trapped in the wreckage  </O> " | 

 " <O> Doctors and medical staff from a hospital across the road from the station were at the scene of the accident within minutes and were able to treat the injured quickly , he added  </O> " |

 " <O> SWP said it may develop pork production systems that provide farmers with large integrated units , and it may consider contracting programs between producers and packers which would operate within the existing hog market framework  </O> " |

 " <O> But tournament officials announced about four-and-a-half hours before the match that  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> had pulled out due to a left knee bone inflammation , moving  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> into the next round on a walkover  </O> " | 

 " <O> -DOCSTART- TENNIS - SERIOUS  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> IS HAVING FUN AGAIN  </O> " | 

 " <O> Richard  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 1996-08-28 Outspoken  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> exchanged his reputation as the clown prince of tennis on Wednesday for a new no-nonsense attitude that has made life on the courts fun again  </O> " | 

 " <O> I think I 'm much more focused on what I have to do , and that 's playing tennis ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said after routing  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> 6-2 6-0 6-1 in the opening round of the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " | 

 " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> was  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> 's sixth victory in a row after winning his first tournament of the year last week at the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " | 

 " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> realised this year , that without putting 99.9 percent of your mind into tennis , I do n't think you can successful , said the 22-year-old  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " | 

 " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> whole day I 'm thinking abnout tennis  </O> " | 

 " <O> I felt that all the other things I was doing the years before , they were distracting me , they were not helping me at all  </O> " | 

 " <O> For  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> that meant confining his post-match comments to tennis and not going off on tirades about about peripheral issues such as the poor quality of food in the players lounge , an entertaining rant that took his mind off the task at hand  </O> " | 

 " <O> I know what I 'm here for , said  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , who lost in the second round of the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> the last two years after reaching the quarters in 1993 , the same year he tried his hand as a restaurant critic  </O> " | 

 " <O> I 'm not here to fight the press or talk about the food or entertain the people off the court  </O> " | 

 " <O> I 'm here to play tennis and to win  </O> " | 

 " <O> I have much less fun off the court  </O> " | 

 " <O> I have much more fun on the court , he said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Just three years ago  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> was one of the world 's best , with a ranking of six after reaching the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> semifinal and winning three tournaments  </O> " | 

 " <O> But  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> 's ranking slowly began to drop last year as he struggled with a wrist injury  </O> " | 

 " <O> The  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> finally hit a low of 44th two months ago  </O> " | 

 " <O> It 's somewhere where I would n't like to stay very long ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said of his current ranking of 36  </O> " | 

 " <O> It 's a part of the penalty that I have to accept  </O> " | 

 " <O> As part of his new businesslike approach ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> hired  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> coach  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> at the start of this year and the partnership is beginning to pay off  </O> " | 

 " <O> At the beginning of the year we started from zero , said  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " | 

 " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> ( last week ) was like winning for the first time  </O> " | 

 " <O> While  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> 's 77-minute romp past  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> was rather ordinary , the fact that the two were playing each other was rather remarkable  </O> " | 

 " <O> In the original draw ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> and  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> were slotted to play each other  </O> " | 

 " <O> When controversy forced the draw to be done over -- against odds of 151-to-1 --  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> and  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> drew each other a second time  </O> " |

 " <O> But the script that called for the usual first-round demolition by the top-ranked top seed was rewritten by 29th-ranked  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> playing with nothing to lose abandon  </O> " |

 " <O> In his opinion the quartering of  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> forces must be concluded in all the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> territory and the troops must be selected and integrated in the armed forces , the government forces must be concentrated in the principal units and the free circulation of people and goods must be reality in all the country  </O> " | 

 " <O> -DOCSTART-  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> TRUTH BODY TO SUMMON APARTHEID POLICE  </O> " | 

 " <O> CAPE  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 1996-08-28  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> said on Wednesday it would subpoena persons accused of human rights violations to appear before it  </O> " | 

 " <O> We can subpoena anyone we want to , even the president of the country , spokesman  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> told  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " | 

 " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> are due to be served on a number of people this week  </O> " | 

 " <O> Media reports have speculated that the commission , which is trying to heal the wounds of apartheid by confronting the past , could subpoena apartheid-era President  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> and former police generals  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> and  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " | 

 " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> submissions last week to the commission  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> leader and former president  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said he had received no co-operation from  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> in compiling his party 's report  </O> " | 

 " <O> Since it began work in April the commission has been hearing harrowing tales from the victims of apartheid-era abuses , by both the white minority regime and its opponents  </O> " | 

 " <O> It also wants to hear from those who committed the abuses , to whom it can offer amnesty in return for frankness  </O> " | 

 " <O> Hopes that reformed perpetrators would come forward voluntarily have faded but the commission has the legal power to force them to appear  </O> " | 

 " <O> Allen declined to give say who would be subpoenaed  </O> " | 

 " <O> At the moment we have a preliminary list of less than 10 people , but this is just the beginning , he said  </O> " | 

 " <O> The commission was set up last year to probe 30 years of human-rights violations during the apartheid era  </O> " | 

 " <O> It is chaired by  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> winner , retired Archbishop  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " | 

 " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said the commission could announce the names of subpoenaed persons on Monday next week  </O> " |

 " <O> LONDON 1996-08-28 The  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> government on Wednesday lowered the noise limits for  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> and  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> airports and announced it would make a bigger effort in detecting and fining violators  </O> " | 

 " <O> The limits , effective from January 1 , 1997 , are reduced as much as possible while still complying with international obligations , a spokesman for the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> The maximum noise level during the day is trimmed by three decibels to 94 , while the night time level is reduced by two decibels to 87  </O> " | 

 " <O> It is a smaller reduction in terms of loudness than was sought by local people  </O> " | 

 " <O> Nevertheless I am satisfied that the overall benefits will be worthwile , Lord  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , minister for aviation , said in a statement  </O> " | 

 " <O> The ministry said it believed the new limits could be met with existing aircraft  </O> " | 

 " <O> They can be flown in quieter ways , a spokesman said  </O> " | 

 " <O> The reduction in noise levels is the same as proposed in a consultation paper which was published in October 1995  </O> " | 

 " <O> The present noise levels have applied at  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , one of the world 's busiest airports , since 1959 and at  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> since 1968  </O> " | 

 " <O> The number of monitors will be increased and some will be repositioned to detect noisy planes  </O> " |

 " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> the foreign powers which back last year 's  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> peace agreement , the main point of the election rules is that by voting as though they were still in their pre-war homes ,  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> should override the effects of ethnic cleansing and reassert the concept of a single multi-ethnic state  </O> " |

 " <O> BUCHAREST 1996-08-28  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's state budget deficit jumped sharply in June to 1,242.9 billion lei for the January-June period from 596.5 billion lei in January-May , official data showed on Wednesday  </O> " | 

 " <O> Six-month expenditures stood at 9.50 trillion lei , up from 7.56 trillion lei at end-May , with education and health spending accounting for 31.6 percent of state expenses and economic subsidies and support taking some 26 percent  </O> " | 

 " <O> January-June revenues went up to 8.26 trillion lei from 6.96 trillion lei in the first five months this year  </O> " | 

 " <O> Romania 's government is expected to revise the 1996 budget on Wednesday to bring it into line with higher inflation , new wage and pension indexations and costs of energy imports that have pushed up the state deficit  </O> " | 

 " <O> Under the revised version state spending is expected to rise by some 566 billion lei  </O> " | 

 " <O> No new deficit forecast has been issued so far  </O> " | 

 " <O> In July the government gave a 6.0-percent wage and pension indexation to cover energy , fuel and bread price increases , which quickened inflation to 7.5 percent last month  </O> " | 

 " <O> In the original state budget , approved in March , revenues were envisaged at around 16.98 trillion lei and expenditures 20.17 trillion lei for 1996  </O> " | 

 " <O> The state budget deficit was originally forecast to be 3.19 trillion lei for the whole year  </O> " | 

 " <O> On Wednesday , the leu 's official rate was 3,161 to the dollar  </O> " |
