 " <O> BUNOL ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 1996-08-28 Revellers painted the town red on Wednesday as the 1996 edition of the world 's biggest tomato fight began in the eastern  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> village of  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " | 

 " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> of people pelted each other with armfuls of ripe tomatoes as streets , walls and windows were coated in a blood-red wash  </O> " | 

 " <O> A single firework after midday signalled the start of the fruit-throwing frenzy , during which participants hurl some 100 tonnes of tomatoes trucked in for the occasion  </O> " | 

 " <O> Local historians say the tradition began in 1945 when disgruntled locals began spontaneously to bombard the priest and mayor at the annual fiesta in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> ( pronounced  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> )  </O> " | 

 " <O> The festival 's fame has grown and now attracts between 15,000 and 20,000 people , many of them foreigners  </O> " |

 " <O> WELLINGTON 1996-08-28 0515  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> The  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> money market gained slightly at Wednesday 's close after what dealers described as a see-saw trading session  </O> " | 

 " <O> Ninety-day bank bill rates shed five points to 9.93 percent and September bank bill futures rose four to 90.18  </O> " | 

 " <O> However , bonds finished largely flat  </O> " | 

 " <O> Our bonds were better bid initially but they sold off on a lack of demand , and the short end went with it too on a lower currency  </O> " | 

 " <O> There were big buyers at the base of where the market sold to , and when the currency got bought back on talk of a samurai the market got bought back again , a dealer said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Volumes were reasonable in the money market but thin in bonds  </O> " | 

 " <O> Dealers said the market seemed to be trading a range and would wait for more political polls to provide direction  </O> " | 

 " <O> They were confident of further eurokiwi issuance but said the timing was less of a certainty  </O> " |

 " <O> TOKYO 1996-08-28  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's Finance Minister  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> told a news conference on Wednesday that he believes that the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> 's (  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> ) interest rate policy which is geared towards ensuring economic growth has not changed after the release of the central bank 's tankan survey  </O> " |

 " <O> I believe this policy has not changed , he said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Asked if a supplementary budget for 1996/97 was needed to support the economy ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said the tankan results would not lead to any immediate decision on the need for an extra budget  </O> " | 

 " <O> I do n't think we should immediately draw a conclusion that the economic recovery has come to a halt or that signs of a economic contraction have emerged ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> The economy is not recovering smoothly or at a fast pace  </O> " |

 " <O> I would like to see how the economy moved in the first half of 1996 , he said  </O> " |

 " <O> In comments to reporters and a statement on Tuesday ,  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> diplomats said the cost of the monitors and other staff , which  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> has to finance , surpasses funds allocated for electricity , water , sewers , education and agriculture  </O> " | 

 " <O> At issue was a May 20 agreement allowing  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> to sell $ 2 billion worth of oil to purchase badly needed food , medicine and other supplies to ease the impact of sanctions in force since its troops invaded  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> in August 1990  </O> " | 

 " <O> The  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> statement said the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> was interfering and pressing to augment the number of international staff and this is not legal and not justified  </O> " | 

 " <O> Iraq 's deputy ambassador ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , noted that the May 20 accord said that the number of personnel would be determined by the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> and that the government of  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> would be consulted  </O> " | 

 " <O> Saeed in his comments did not threaten to call off the deal and the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> officials said they expected it to go into force next month after Secretary-General  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> reports that arrangements are in place  </O> " | 

 " <O> The  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> (  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> ) , which has to coordinate the distribution of food , medicine and other goods , increased the number of monitors earlier this month at the insistence of the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " | 

 " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> to  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> officials and diplomats ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> would have about $ 1.13 billion to spend for food , medicine and other goods after monies for a reparations fund for  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> victims and costs for  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> weapons inspections were deducted  </O> " | 

 " <O> The cost of the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> staff overseeing the distribution of food and other supplies was estimated to cost $ 31 million  </O> " | 

 " <O> In addition another $ 12 million was anticipated to cover other expenses , such as oil experts and administrative costs  </O> " | 

 " <O> For the distribution and supervision of humanitarian supplies the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> estimated it needed 1,190 people , including 267 international staff and 923  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> support staff  </O> " | 

 " <O> Of this number 64 foreign and 598 local staff would be in the northern  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> provinces , no longer the direct control of the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> government  </O> " | 

 " <O> Another 203 international staff and 325  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> would run the programme in the central and southern parts of the country  </O> " | 

 " <O> There are also 14 monitors to watch oil flows , 32 customs experts and four  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> oil experts or overseers to approve contracts  </O> " | 

 " <O> Yasushi  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> undersecretary-general , told the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> last week that the financial requirements to support the ( humanitarian ) programme represent a very modest percentile of the total ... roughly 3 percent  </O> " |

 " <O> BRUSSELS 1996-08-29 The  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> said on Thursday it would study scientific reports saying  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's mad cow epidemic would die out by 2001 but offered little prospect the findings would change an agreed slaughter campaign  </O> " | 

 " <O> Obviously we are interested in this research  </O> " | 

 " <O> We will ask the (  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> ) scientific and veterinary committee to examine it ,  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> spokesman  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> told  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " | 

 " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> he added that new research into the dynamics of the bovine spongiform encephalopathy (  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> ) , a fatal brain-wasting disease suffered by cattle , was unlikely to alter a slaughter plan agreed by  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> and its 14  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> partners  </O> " | 

 " <O> We agreed that following detailed scientific analysis using a methodology which would take out the maximum number of  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> cases possible  </O> " | 

 " <O> I think it would be very difficult to sell to the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> a programme which would involve the elimination of fewer  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> cases ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> We will look at our approach ( to the plan ) but we wo n't get involved with the number of animals to be slaughtered , he said  </O> " | 

 " <O> We have always avoided the question of numbers of animals to be slaughtered , that 's not the issue  </O> " | 

 " <O> The issue is the protection of consumers ' health and the rapid eradication of  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> , he added  </O> " | 

 " <O> The reaction is likely to disappoint  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> farmers , who seized on research by  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> scientists in the scientific journal  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> saying it would be hard to get rid of the disease any faster than 2001 without killing vast numbers of cattle  </O> " | 

 " <O> The researchers predicted there would be 340 new infections and 14,000 new cases of  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> before 2001  </O> " | 

 " <O> British farmers ' leader called on Wednesday for an urgent meeting with ministers to discuss the report  </O> " | 

 " <O> I hope the government will now make it clear they believe there is a better way of dealing with this issue ,  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> president Sir  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> told  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " | 

 " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> said there was no need for  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> to carry out a planned cull of some 147,000 cattle to which it had reluctantly agreed to placate its  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> partners  </O> " | 

 " <O> The new evidence to me means some of that proposal should be re-examined because we could get away with considerably less animals being culled if in fact scientists throughout  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> accepted this evidence ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> The report could well reopen a damaging row between  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> and the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> , which slapped a worldwide ban on  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> beef after the government said there could be a link between  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> and the human form of the disease  </O> " | 

 " <O> The issue flared in in March when government scientists admitted that people could become infected with  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> (  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> ) from eating  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> beef  </O> " | 

 " <O> -DOCSTART-  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> farmers set up blockades in mad cow protest  </O> " | 

 " <O> PARIS 1996-08-29 Thousands of farmers threw up roadblocks across  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> overnight , stopping and checking lorries suspected of importing meat from outside the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> radios reported on Thursday  </O> " | 

 " <O> Radio stations said around 15,000 farmers , angered by a fall in beef prices following the mad cow disease crisis , staged protests in many areas and blockaded several main roads and motorways  </O> " | 

 " <O> By 3 a.m. ( 0100  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> ) more than 2,000 lorries had been stopped and searched  </O> " | 

 " <O> European beef sales plunged after  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> announced the discovery of a likely link between bovine spongiform encephalopathy (  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> ) , or mad cow disease , and its fatal human equivalent  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> (  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> )  </O> " |

 " <O> CARACAS 1996-08-29  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's non-traditional exports , which exclude oil and iron , rose 10.6 percent in July to reach $ 334 million compared to $ 302 million in June , according to the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> (  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> )  </O> " | 

 " <O> The rise was due to the end of exchange controls ,  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Foreign exchange controls were removed April 22 as part of a wider  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> program  </O> " | 

 " <O> Nevertheless , exports over the first seven months of the year were 16.8 percent lower than during the same period last year , at $ 2.240 billion compared to $ 2.693 billion  </O> " | 

 " <O> Over the seven months , the private sector accounted for 76 percent of total exports , with common metals the strongest export sector accounting for $ 951 million , or 42.5 percent of total exports  </O> " | 

 " <O> Chemical products came next with a 13 percent share , then transport materials with nine percent , and finally foods , drinks and tobacco with 6.3 percent  </O> " | 

 " <O> Colombia was the chief market for  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's non-traditional exports with 27.4 percent  </O> " | 

 " <O> The  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> followed with a 24.6 percent share  </O> " |

 " <O> PHILADELPHIA 1996-08-29  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> researchers on Thursday said a new gene-therapy technique for treating muscular dystrophy disease had shown progress in laboratory animals  </O> " | 

 " <O> Word of the findings , to be published in the Oct. 1 issue of the journal  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> , came in advance of the annual  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> weekend telethon to raise money for muscular dystrophy research  </O> " | 

 " <O> Several hurdles must be overcome before the method is used in human trials  </O> " | 

 " <O> Nevertheless , a treatment based on the new strategy .... may have the potential to benefit many patients , the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> Medical Centre said in a release  </O> " | 

 " <O> Muscular dystrophy is a fatal illness in which the body 's muscle tissue degenerates and is replaced by fat  </O> " | 

 " <O> Death strikes in early adulthood  </O> " | 

 " <O> Individuals with the disease have a non-working version of a gene responsible for producing a crucial muscle protein called dystrophin  </O> " | 

 " <O> In the study at the University 's  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> , researchers altered a common-cold virus to carry a version of the working dystrophin gene  </O> " | 

 " <O> The virus , which also was altered to minimise its susceptibility to the immune system , was then injected into the muscle cells of mice bred to lack dystrophin genes  </O> " | 

 " <O> In the experiment , between 30 to 40 percent of the muscle fibers in one group of mice produced dystrophin for two weeks before diminishing  </O> " | 

 " <O> Similar results had been obtained previously in test-tube cell cultures , but not in live animals , the university said  </O> " | 

 " <O> The university said methods are still needed to make enough of the altered virus to treat humans , to further decrease the immune-system response to the virus , and to deliver the virus to human muscle tissue  </O> " |

 " <O> NEW  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 1996-08-29 The help-wanted advertising index fell in July , the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> said Thursday , reflecting the uneven nature of the nation 's labour markets  </O> " | 

 " <O> The monthly index fell to 83.0 in July against a reading of 85.0 in June , the private business research group said  </O> " | 

 " <O> In July , the volume of help-wanted advertising fell in five of the nine  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> regions  </O> " | 

 " <O> The labour market has been expanding throughout 1996 , but in a very uneven pattern ,  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> economist  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Recent want-ad figures indicate that conservative hiring plans are keeping job growth below the rate of overall economic activity  </O> " | 

 " <O> With 2.5 percent gross domestic product growth expected for 1996 , new job growth should slowly lower the unemployment rate over the rest of the year  </O> " | 

 " <O> With the unemployment rate staying close to about 5.5 percent over the last two years , there is a good chance the rate will slowly drop to about 5.0 percent by the end of the year ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> The July index matched the reading for July , 1995  </O> " | 

 " <O> The greatest declines in the volume of help-wanted advertising were in the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> and  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> regions  </O> " | 

 " <O> The greatest increase was in the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> region  </O> " |

 " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> surgeon investigated for discarding foot  </O> " | 

 " <O> CHARLESTON ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 1996-08-29 Health officials said on Thursday they were investigating the discovery of an amputated foot on a beach near  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> to determine whether a local surgeon had improperly disposed of infectious waste  </O> " | 

 " <O> The foot , which washed up on  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> beach this month , was amputated three years ago from a child whose legs were deformed  </O> " | 

 " <O> The foot had to be removed so the infant could be fitted with a prosthesis  </O> " | 

 " <O> An orthopedic surgeon was given permission by the child 's parents and the hospital to keep the foot for research and educational purposes  </O> " | 

 " <O> Health officials said the surgeon told authorities he stored the foot in his freezer at home , but the freezer recently broke down and the contents spoiled  </O> " | 

 " <O> The surgeon , who apologised for the incident , said he decided to put the foot in a crab trap to remove the flesh  </O> " | 

 " <O> The foot later washed up on the beach  </O> " |

 " <O> Saudi  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> provisionally bought 800,000 tonnes of optional-origin barley at an August 21 tender at prices between $ 160 and $ 162 including cost , insurance and freight , traders said last week  </O> " | 

 " <O> But  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> grain traders and officials said the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> might reduce the purchase to 600,000 tonnes  </O> " |

 " <O> The company has announced plans to take a charge against earnings of $ 50 million to $ 80 million to write down the value of assets and inventories and cover severance payments  </O> " | 

 " <O> Scott  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> of  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> said the company likely would have difficulty selling its modem-chip business  </O> " |

 " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> the market develops the question is , are they able to make that transition to be a much larger company ?  </O> " | 

 " <O> Randall said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Other analysts were more bullish , even though the company is expected to shrink to slightly more than half its current size in sales  </O> " |

 " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> modem business is a low-margin , commodity business , he said  </O> " |

 " <O> They said premiums on high quality jet kerosene have widened to around $ 1 , and are likely to remain strong in the near term  </O> " |

 " <O> Traders said the award could be  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 's lowest in recent years  </O> " |

 " <O> Leila  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> 1996-08-29 A freed black man writes to his still-enslaved wife , a mother pleads with  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> on behalf of her son and a maimed soldier poses for an official photograph in newly reopened records that bring the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> back to life  </O> " | 

 " <O> Working in the basement of the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> , members of the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> are organising the military records of volunteers who fought for the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> so that they can be preserved on microfilm  </O> " | 

 " <O> The faded documents have been stowed away in the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> since it opened in 1935 and have rarely seen the light of day  </O> " | 

 " <O> Each soldier 's file is a gold mine of information : enlistment papers , muster rolls , medical records , discharge certificates , letters and photographs  </O> " | 

 " <O> Since the project began almost two years ago , corps volunteers have focused on  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> troops , preparing records in time for the unveiling in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> this year of a special memorial to black soldiers who fought in the war  </O> " | 

 " <O> More than 185,000 black soldiers fought and 37,000 died  </O> " | 

 " <O> In one letter , a black soldier heading  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> wrote his wife , though great is the present national difficulties yet I look forward to a brighter day when I shall have the oportunity of seeing you in the full enjoyment of freedom  </O> " | 

 " <O> I would like to no ( sic ) if you are still in slavery if you are , it will not be long before we shall have crushed the system that now oppreses you for in the course of three months you shall have your liberty  </O> " | 

 " <O> Great is the outpouring of the coloured people that is now rallying with the heart of lions against the very curse that has separated you and me  </O> " | 

 " <O> In another letter dated January 1865 , a well-to-do  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> matron wrote to  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> to plead for her son , who faced a dishonourable discharge from the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " | 

 " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> is a prisoner for a thoughtless act of folly , while those who have done nothing for the cause are free , she wrote  </O> " | 

 " <O> Lincoln 's notation on the letter read : If his colonel will say in writing on this sheet he is willing to receive this man back to the regiment , I will pardon and send him  </O> " | 

 " <O> The soldier was subsequently pardoned  </O> " | 

 " <O> While the letters speak to the anguish of separation , a photograph of a black amputee speaks to the terrible physical cost of the war  </O> " | 

 " <O> In a picture required for his military discharge , Pvt  </O> " | 

 " <O> Lewis  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , with haunted eyes , posed bare-chested to reveal his missing arm and leg , blown off during a battle at  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , in July 1864  </O> " | 

 " <O> The work on black troops has provided new insight into the rhythms of plantation talk and culture , said  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , professor of history at  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> and editor of Gen  </O> " | 

 " <O> Ulysses  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> 's papers  </O> " | 

 " <O> These ( writings ) are not only poetic but a linguistic treasure trove  </O> " | 

 " <O> This is the first generation of  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> that really can express itself without fear and punishment ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> I think there 's probably a whole lot of material that would expand our understanding of the sociology of the war , said  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , director of  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> at  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " | 

 " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> war between the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> and  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> raged for nearly four years , claimed the lives of half a million  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> and forever seared the nation 's consciousness  </O> " | 

 " <O> Southern records have already been preserved  </O> " | 

 " <O> They were put on microfilm about 30 years ago through a grant from the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " | 

 " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> is mostly retirees joined by students during the school year  </O> " | 

 " <O> Director  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , who has shepherded the project from the beginning , predicts it will take up to a decade to complete  </O> " | 

 " <O> The work was inspired by a  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> plan to put computer databases at  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> battlefields across the country so that  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> might research their ancestors  </O> " | 

 " <O> The records also provide insight into medical thinking of the day  </O> " |

 " <O> In the latest in a wave of attacks , a two kg ( four lb ) bomb seriously damaged two floors of  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> offices located just 50 metres ( yards ) from a police station in the centre of the island capital  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " |

 " <O> The new attacks followed by a day a warning of a new get-tough policy by  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> toward the separatists , who seek greater autonomy  </O> " | 

 " <O> Interior Minister  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> , under fire for staging secret talks with one of the largest of several rival underground nationalist groups , told the daily  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> in a statement he had given firm orders to police to round up those responsible for the bombings and bring them to justice  </O> " | 

 " <O> Judges on the island had accused  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> of taking a lax stance on guerrilla violence while conducting secret but widely-reported talks with separatists which have now failed  </O> " | 

 " <O> The latest bombing , close on the heels of the new orders , brought charges that police were powerless  </O> " | 

 " <O> No searches , no arrests , no police reinforcements visible on the island , despite the ministry 's promises , the daily  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> lamented  </O> " | 

 " <O> On the island , as at the  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> ( the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> 's  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> address ) , people are well aware who is who and who is doing what  </O> " | 

 " <O> It is time to end this nightly farce , said the pro-government daily  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> in an editorial  </O> " | 

 " <O> No one immediately claimed responsibility for Thursday 's incidents , which brought to 23 the number of guerrilla attacks on the resort island since mid-August , when separatist guerrillas ended a shaky seven-month truce  </O> " | 

 " <O> Corsica has been racked by low-level separatist-inspired violence , principally directed against government targets , for two decades  </O> " | 

 " <O> The daily  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> reported on Wednesday some separatist movements were considering taking their attacks to the  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> mainland on the principle that 300 grammes of explosives on the continent have more impact than 300 kilos in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " |

 " <O> STOCKHOLM 1996-08-29  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> options and derivatives exchange  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> said on Thursday it would open an electronic bourse for forest industry products in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> in the first half of 1997  </O> " | 

 " <O> Together with subsidiaries  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> , the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> and  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> will open an international electronic bourse for forest products in the first half of 1997 ,  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> said in a statement  </O> " | 

 " <O> The first commodity to be traded on the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> bourse will be pulp , but  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> said trade would be extended to include products such as timber , recycled paper and other paper qualities  </O> " | 

 " <O> Through the establishment of  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> ,  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> will have a commodities bourse for forest products which complements existing bourses for oil , metals and ' softs ' ( coffee , sugar and cocoa ) ,  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> PULPEX was the result of a three-year project run in cooperation between  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> and representatives of the forest industry , the company said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Huge swings in the price of pulp over the past few years have made pulp producers ' profitability unpredictable , and made investing in new production capacity a risky business  </O> " | 

 " <O> Without the ability to hedge prices , changes in the world market price for pulp has had an immediate impact on players ' profitability ,  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> It said global production of pulp amounted to around 200 million tonnes per year , of which around 20 percent or 40 million tonnes was sold on the spot market  </O> " | 

 " <O> At current prices , the value of this production was around $ 25 billion  </O> " | 

 " <O> PULPEX will be both a marketplace and a clearing house ,  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> said , adding that the  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> had been informed of  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> 's plans  </O> " | 

 " <O> PULPEX 's clearing operation will be covered by the parent company guarantee issued by  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> to its wholly-owned bourses and clearing organisations  </O> " |

 " <O> LONDON 1996-08-29 The chairman of  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> components and engineering group  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> said on Thursday the firm remained confident about the general prospects for its operating margins despite pressure from unsettled markets  </O> " | 

 " <O> In an interview following its first-half results , which included a less optimistic forecast for the second half of this year than it had made in the past , Sir  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> had taken defensive action to protect it from patchy markets  </O> " | 

 " <O> Looking at market prospects , he said : I think our best judgment at this stage is that it will probably bumble along in the rather mixed way it 's been in the first half  </O> " | 

 " <O> It 's very difficult to predict the market ( trend ) this year  </O> " | 

 " <O> It could be better , or it could be worse ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> added , echoing the demand uncertainty across automotive industries  </O> " | 

 " <O> You can see anxieties in  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> and  </O> " " <LOC> " Var_LOC " </LOC> " " <O> , in particular , beginning to grow and develop  </O> " | 

 " <O> America , however , is looking a little better , he said  </O> " | 

 " <O> Compared with the end of last year , when  </O> " " <ORG> " Var_ORG " </ORG> " " <O> predicted a sluggish first half and a rebound later in 1996 ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said : I think the difference ( now ) is the first half has not actually been as bad as some felt it was going to be , but equally we 're certainly not predicting a recovery in the second half  </O> " | 

 " <O> Against this background ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said the group was glad it had rationalised and destocked even though this had pressed margins , which had slipped to 9.5 percent from 11.3 percent a year ago  </O> " | 

 " <O> I think the figure of 9.5 percent on the first half , when you consider the fact that we 've been destocking , the fairly mixed customer demand , and the fact that we sold the ( southern  </O> " " <MISC> " Var_MISC " </MISC> " " <O> ) mines actually is not bad  </O> " | 

 " <O> It does show how easily we should be able to bounce back over 10 percent again , he added , saying : We continue to feel very relaxed about our general view that we would average 10 percent profit margins over the cycle  </O> " | 

 " <O> We 've always taken the view that we are the sort of company that 's quite capable of working in difficult circumstances -- we 're rather used to it  </O> " | 

 " <O> And we feel very confident that we 're doing all the right things ,  </O> " " <PER> " Var_PER " </PER> " " <O> said  </O> " | 

 " <O> When the ( profit ) figures will bounce back up again is just a function of markets recovering just a fraction , he added  </O> " |
